definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: The soybean oil massively uses in boiling no matter what with manufacture oleomargarine.
sentences.chinese: 大豆油大量用于烹任和制造人造奶油。

sentences.english: Can you tell the difference between butter and margarine?
sentences.chinese: 你知道奶油和人造奶油的差别吗？

sentences.english: SUBSTITUTE】We often substitute margarine for butter.
sentences.chinese: 我们经常以人造奶油代替奶油。

sentences.english: The salads with grilled chicken also have liquid margarine.
sentences.chinese: 那个烤鸡沙拉也添加了人造奶油。

sentences.english: Butter or margarine help to keep bread moist.
sentences.chinese: 牛油或人造奶油有助于保持面包的水分。

sentences.english: Mary asked for butter , but the dealer palmed off margarine on her .
sentences.chinese: 玛丽要奶油，但店主却拿人造奶油欺骗她。

sentences.english: First of all, butter substitutes like margarine contain just as much fat as butter.
sentences.chinese: 首先，奶油替代品如人造奶油，会含有很多的脂肪。

sentences.english: We often substitute margarine for butter.
sentences.chinese: 经常用人造奶油代替奶油。

sentences.english: At one time, margarine was illegal.
sentences.chinese: 人造奶油一度是违法的。

sentences.english: You can substitute margarine for butter .
sentences.chinese: 你可以用人造奶油代替奶油。

definition: see 反式脂肪[fan3 shi4 zhi1 fang2]
